>   File        : /Scenarios/torture.zip 

Ok, the reason I sent the announcement is because I added a new 
scenario - #454.  It's a version of #401, but I've been working on it 
to bring it to the point of being a 'legitimate' starter level.  Yes, 
there are some . . interesting opponents.  Aside having that sheer 
amount of gold and the accompanying potions, I'd like some comments on 
what else that scenario (#454) needs to become more legitimate.
